text: unhonne kaha, "ai shuaib! teree bahut-see baaton ko samajhane mein to ham asamarth hai. aur ham to tujhe dekhate hai ki too hamaare madhy atyant nirbal hai. yadi tere bhaee-bandhu na hote to ham patthar maar-maarakar kabhee ka tujhe samaapt kar chuke hote. too itane bal-bootevaala to nahin ki hamapar bhaaree ho.
